short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy 3P Cost Data to a Case/Ticket

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is purpose built for WM SBS Vendor Relations group user to allow them to select 3rd party vendor information from a PowerBI report and send that to a Salesforce quote case and Acorn ticket.
